questions.question: This term refers to the branch of technology that deals with the design, construction, operation, and application of robots.
This type of robot is designed to perform tasks in environments that are hazardous to humans.
This term refers to the ability of a robot to move and interact with its environment.
This type of sensor is commonly used in robotics to detect obstacles and measure distance.
This programming language is widely used in robotics for its simplicity and versatility.
